S1.name: Spirit:
S1.text: This statue truly captures your greatness my king, where may I find such a great sculptor?

S2.name: Spirit:
S2.text: I offer you this basket as a tribute to your generous and fair rule, thank you, great king.

S3.name: Spirit:
S3.text: We have nothing and yet you granted my daughter a scholarship to the academy.

S3.name: Spirit:
S3.text: Her future is very bright, and I hope she goes on to serve you!

M1.name: Spirit:
M1.text: We ask for your guidance in this difficult time, great king.

M2.name: Spirit:
M2.text: You used to be so kind to the common folkâ€” What happened?

M3.name: Spirit:
M3.text: You shut yourselves inside your walls while the rest of us stand here and starve.

M3.name: Spirit:
M3.text: Do not make us break down those doors.
